engine.android.core.extra

类 EventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.android.core.extra.EventBus

  • public final class EventBus
extends Object
    事件总线

    功能：事件监听及发送机制

    从以下版本开始:
    6/6/2014
    版本:
    N
    作者:
    Daimon

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  EventBus.Event
      传输事件
      static interface  EventBus.EventHandler
      事件处理器（在主线程处理）
      static interface  EventBus.EventProcessor
      事件处理器（在当前线程处理）

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      EventBus()
      Creates a new EventBus instance; each instance is a separate scope in which events are delivered.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static EventBus getDefault() 
      void post(EventBus.Event event)
      Posts the given event to the event bus.
      void register(String action, EventBus.EventHandler subscriber)
      Registers the given subscriber for special action to receive events.
      void unregister(EventBus.EventHandler subscriber)
      Unregisters the given subscriber from all events.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • EventBus

        public EventBus()
        Creates a new EventBus instance; each instance is a separate scope in which events are delivered. To use a central observer, consider getDefault().

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDefault

        public static final EventBus getDefault()

      • register

        public void register(String action,
                     EventBus.EventHandler subscriber)
        Registers the given subscriber for special action to receive events. Subscribers must call unregister(EventHandler) once they are no longer interested in receiving events.

      • unregister

        public void unregister(EventBus.EventHandler subscriber)
        Unregisters the given subscriber from all events.

      • post

        public void post(EventBus.Event event)
        Posts the given event to the event bus.
